participant_2.background:
I like to do my laundry on the weekends when I have more time.
I am not a morning person but my peace and quiet is important to me.
I love discovering new things about myself!
i have shot a lion.
i like to draw.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What about you?
I'm doing great! I'm just getting ready to do some laundry. How about you? Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I don't have any plans yet. I might just relax and do some drawing. I'm not really a morning person, so I usually like to sleep in on the weekends.
That sounds nice. I love to draw too! I'm not really a morning person either, so I usually sleep in on the weekends too.
That's cool! What kind of things do you like to draw?
I like to draw animals and landscapes. I also like to draw people, but I'm not very good at it yet.
That's cool! I like to draw animals too. I'm not very good at drawing people either, but I'm getting better.
That's good! I'm always looking for people to draw with.
That sounds fun! I'd love to draw with you sometime.
Great! We should exchange contact information.
